name: RUUUUUUN
description:
RUUUUUUN - The game is a puzzle. Move the pawns in the right sequence to move to the next level.
There may be several pawns, so the gameplay can be difficult.
Beware of traps, but even if you lose, the level will start again.

- Stylish graphics
- Tube soundtrack
- 15 levels
- Mini plot
